62.1.hd_quote: The ability to transcend the boredom of routine through a rich and daring fantasy life.
62.1.behavioral_axis: Builds reliable detail through steady ritual plus inner simulations.
62.1.shadow_axis: Endless theorizing; never publishing the pattern.

62.2.hd_quote: The innate restrictiveness and discipline to comply with and exalt restraint.
62.2.behavioral_axis: Looks like it’s doing detail and often is.
62.2.shadow_axis: Appears precise but hasn’t actually checked the data.

62.3.hd_quote: The ability to discover valuable information in detail work and find innovative applications.
62.3.behavioral_axis: Finds new facts by getting it ‘wrong’ first.
62.3.shadow_axis: Quits because detail is boring, missing the discovery.

62.4.hd_quote: The perfected ascetic withdrawal in the pursuit of harmony and simplicity.
62.4.behavioral_axis: Leaves the noise to complete the detail correctly.
62.4.shadow_axis: Endless research; never presenting the pattern.

62.5.hd_quote: When excellence is achieved, action is necessary.
62.5.behavioral_axis: Waits until the detail is complete, then delivers.
62.5.shadow_axis: Seduced by projection → speaks before details are ready.

62.6.hd_quote: Detail as the path to material success.
62.6.behavioral_axis: Gives detail only when it will actually guide the collective.
62.6.shadow_axis: Has the skills but not the discipline to use them.
